title: Priyanka Chopra puts on leggy display in white midi dress in New York.... after returning from India
text:
She was on a whirlwind promotional trip in India the past few days.

And Priyanka Chopra certainly landed on US soil in style.

The 37-year-old wife of Nick Jonas put on quite the leggy display while out and about in New York City on Monday.

Simply stunning: Priyanka Chopra put on quite the leggy display while out and about in New York City on Monday

Priyanka definitely turned heads on the Big Apple streets as she rocked an off-white mini dress with three-quarter length sleeves.

She teamed the look with a pair of black leather heels with a strap around the ankle and a matching pair of designer shades.

Her brunette tresses were worn down as she accentuated her make-up with complementary make-up topped off with a swipe of pink lip.

The stunner is back in the US after a series of promotional events in India for her new film, which is set to be released in the U.S. on October 11.

Wow factor: The 37-year-old wife of Nick Jonas definitely turned heads on the Big Apple streets as she rocked an off-white mini dress with three-quarter length sleeves

The Sky Is Pink follows the the span of a 25-year love story as told by the couple's terminally ill teenage daughter.

Priyanka stars as Aditi, a mother who is forced to grapple with her newborn's immune deficiency.

The actress opened up to Entertainment Weekly about a moment in the movie that made her husband, musician Nick Jonas, 27, tear up.

'I was filming The Sky Is Pink till four days before my wedding and Nick was on set,' she told the outlet.

'We were doing prep for the wedding on set and my co-producers and Shonali, they were so accommodating.'

The couple wed in two ceremonies, with number one located in Jodhpur, India in December 2018.

Rocking it: She teamed the look with a pair of black leather heels with a strap around the ankle and a matching pair of designer shades

She told the Times of India that viewers should bring both their 'brain and heart' when watching the movie.

'This is a very special film based on a special real-life couple who thrive through extraordinary circumstances,' she began.

'I feel like in a cynical world today where we live our own lives, this film shows you what it can do when you have a family, family support.'

She continued: 'I feel like when I read the movie (script), that's when you know.. jumped out at me so much because my parents were like that.

'They were extremely supportive and that gave me the ability to be who I am and where I am today. You will need your brain and your heart.'
